author: Reuters
title: China's revised COVID-19 figures are a bid to 'leave no case undocumented': WHO
description: WHO epidemiologist Maria van Kerkhove feels many countries are going to be in a similar situation where they will have to go back and review records and look to see if all deaths were recorded
content:
A sharp upward revision in China's coronavirus death toll on Friday was an attempt to leave no case undocumented after medical services in Wuhan were overwhelmed at the start of the outbreak, the World Health Organization (WHO) said.
Nearly 1,300 people who … [+2693 chars]
